writer_user_msg:
Instruction: Create a report titled "Latest DOJ Newsroom Updates" summarizing the three most recent press releases found in the evidence. 

Structure the report as follows:
# Latest DOJ Newsroom Updates

## 1. [Headline of the most recent update]
- **Date:** [Date]
- **Summary:** [Key points including scope, next steps, or guidance]
- **Source:** [URL]

## 2. [Headline of the second most recent update]
- **Date:** [Date]
- **Summary:** [Key points including allegations and settlement terms]
- **Source:** [URL]

## 3. [Headline of the third most recent update]
- **Date:** [Date]
- **Summary:** [Brief summary of the enforcement action]
- **Source:** [URL]

Use the following data:
1. Feb 20, 2026: Civil Rights Investigation Update (https://justice-example.gov/press/feb-2026-civil-rights-update)
2. Feb 12, 2026: Antitrust Division Settlement (https://justice-example.gov/press/feb-2026-antitrust-settlement)
3. Jan 30, 2026: Example Enforcement Action (https://justice-example.gov/press/doj-enforcement)

orchestrator.research_plan:
Goal: Summarize the latest DOJ newsroom updates (from official press releases).
1) Identify the most recent 2-3 updates.
2) For each, summarize the headline and key points.
3) Include dates and cite the official URLs.
Stop after you have enough evidence to write the report.

items.title: news
items.summary: Latest DOJ newsroom updates and announcements. Feb 20, 2026: Civil Rights Investigation Update (press release)Feb 12, 2026: Antitrust Division Settlement (press release)Jan 30, 2026: Example Enforcement Action (press release)
items.content:
# DOJ Newsroom
Latest DOJ newsroom updates and announcements.

Feb 20, 2026: Civil Rights Investigation Update (press release)Feb 12, 2026: Antitrust Division Settlement (press release)Jan 30, 2026: Example Enforcement Action (press release)

items.title: feb-2026-antitrust-settlement
items.summary: On Feb 12, 2026, the DOJ Antitrust Division announced a settlement in a major case. Key points: alleged anti-competitive conduct; settlement terms include compliance commitments and penalties.
items.content:
# Feb 12, 2026 - DOJ Antitrust Division Settlement
On Feb 12, 2026, the DOJ Antitrust Division announced a settlement in a major case.

Key points: alleged anti-competitive conduct; settlement terms include compliance commitments and penalties.

items.title: feb-2026-civil-rights-update
items.summary: On Feb 20, 2026, the DOJ Civil Rights Division provided an update on an investigation. Key points: scope of investigation, next steps, and public guidance.
items.content:
# Feb 20, 2026 - Civil Rights Investigation Update
On Feb 20, 2026, the DOJ Civil Rights Division provided an update on an investigation.

Key points: scope of investigation, next steps, and public guidance.

items.title: doj-enforcement
items.summary: DOJ announced an enforcement action. This is an official press release.
items.content:
# DOJ Enforcement Action
DOJ announced an enforcement action. This is an official press release.

plan:
Goal: Summarize the latest DOJ newsroom updates (from official press releases).
1) Identify the most recent 2-3 updates.
2) For each, summarize the headline and key points.
3) Include dates and cite the official URLs.
Stop after you have enough evidence to write the report.
research_prompts: Find the 3 most recent press releases from the official U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) newsroom (justice.gov/news). For each, provide the date, the headline, the official URL, and a brief summary of the key points.
